DOC.brief_title: To Assess Rate Extent Absorption Hydrocodone From 20 mg Hydrocodone Bitartrate Extended-Release Capsules
DOC.detailed_description: Safety parameter assess included medical history , physical examination , vital sign , 12-lead ECGs , clinical laboratory test adverse event assessment .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteers . Aged great 18 less 45 year . Were medically healthy clinically significant abnormality basis medical history , physical examination laboratory evaluation Volunteer consent participate study . Female volunteer include surgically sterile , use acceptable method birth control define either oral , injectable , implantable , barrier method contraception ( ie , diaphragm spermicidal cream , intrauterine device ( IUD ) spermicidal cream condom spermicidal cream ) . Participants clinical trial within previous 90 day participant narcotic analgesic study within previous 12 month . Deviation excess 10 % ideal body weight height accord Metropolitan Life Insurance Tables ( 1983 edition ) . History drug alcohol abuse time past History hypersensitivity study drug similar compound acetaminophen . Therapeutic use ( reason ) narcotic analgesic within previous year . Subjects use tricyclic antidepressant monoamine oxidase inhibitor time past . Subjects history , clinical sign suggestive , chronic obstructive airway disease . Receipt prescription medication ( except birth control ) within 2 week prior entry study receipt nonprescription overthecounter medication within one week study commencement . ( Vitamin supplement acceptable ) . Blood donation within 90 day previous study entry . Female volunteer positive serum pregnancy test , risk become pregnant study . Volunteers history smoking ( must smoke within last 6 month ) . Volunteers clinical/biochemical impairment liver function , receipt know hepatic enzyme induce inhibit agent within 30 day prior entry study . History presence significant hepatic , renal , endocrine , cardiac , nervous , gastrointestinal , pulmonary metabolic disorder . Any condition history investigator consider might increase risk volunteer interfere evaluation data .
